statistical_targets: Examine all quotes for expressions of positive and negative sentiment
Examine all quotes for expressions of positive and negative sentiment
curated_evidence.curation_instructions: Review all 9 quotes across the 2 documents. The goal is not to validate the spurious correlation but to perform a foundational qualitative analysis. Identify and select all high-quality quotes that clearly express either positive or negative sentiment to create a descriptive summary of the content.
